product_name: The North Face Warm Boot-Top Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you wear them under your ski pants or inside your sleeping bag, the Warm Boot-Top long underwear bottoms from The North Face provide warmth with soft texture and a snug fit. Midweight base layer pants provide optimal warmth and moisture management during cold-weather activities. Lightweight, breathable FlashDry(TM) polyester wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Added stretch provides a close, comfortable fit. Elastic logo waistband; flatlock seams; 3/4-length legs. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you wear them under your ski pants or inside your sleeping bag, the Warm Boot-Top long underwear bottoms from The North Face provide warmth with soft texture and a snug fit.
